definitions.definition: (of places and things) expensive and of high quality:
examples: He takes her to some really posh restaurants.

definitions.definition: (of people and their voices) from a high social class:
examples: A woman with a very posh accent phoned for him earlier.

definitions.definition: used for describing a woman from a high social class who chooses to have a caesarean section (= a medical operation) to have her baby
